summary: I am ended. My soul has departed my body. I haven't cried that hard at losing a character in a very very long time. My poor...
question: I am ended. My soul has departed my body. I haven't cried that hard at losing a character in a very very long time. My poor sister kept squeezing my hand and rubbing my arm and saying "It's okay. You're gonna be okay." But she's wrong. I'll never be okay again.
answer:
I can relate to this. 💔 Honestly, it feels like a real person in my life died. Someone very close to me. Someone I love. I am in mourning. One moment I am fine and then the next I am sobbing. I don’t think I will ever get over it.

We had Tony Stark for 11 years and it simply was not long enough. No amount of time is. ❤

reblog.comment:

We had Tony Stark for 11 years and it simply was not long enough. No amount of time is. ❤

summary: That Fic is heeling my heart 😭😭❤️
question: That Fic is heeling my heart 😭😭❤️
answer:
Awww. Thank you. That means a lot. ❤❤ It truly does. Writing it is helping to mend my broken heart and I hope it helps someone else too. I will try and get another chapter up soon.

Included a link for those interested.

What Happened After (Endgame), an avengers fanfic | FanFiction

summary: Tony Stark’s first words when he gets back to earth are “we lost” and “I lost the kid,” and if you don’t think that humanity...
body: Tony Stark’s first words when he gets back to earth are “we lost” and “I lost the kid,” and if you don’t think that humanity comes first and then immediately Peter Parker for Tony Stark then idk what to tell you. Tony Stark risked everything to bring Peter Parker back! He was not going to go down that rabbit hole of time travel until he looked at Peter Parker’s picture. And Harley was at his funeral!!! Iron Man 3 was in 2013! And Harley was at a very private, very personal send off that the superheroes had for Tony. He and Happy were the only people there not actually related to a Super which means that Tony considered Harley as his family. Listen what I’m saying is, Tony Stark had three children and after everything has been said and done in these movies, he has proved that he is the guy to make the sacrifice play. For humanity, for his kids.

summary: but you know what?? i hope carol and the guardians tell tonys story. i hope she visits all the planets she helped through the...
body:
but you know what?? i hope carol and the guardians tell tonys story. i hope she visits all the planets she helped through the time and tell to the WHOLE UNIVERSE that TONY STARK SAVED THEM. i hope the guardians tell to everyone in their way, that they are alive because TONY STARK IS NOT.

THAT HE DIED SO THEY ALL COULD COME BACK, SO EVERY FAMILY COULD BE REUNITED, SO EVERY FATHER COULD HUG THEIR CHILDREN AGAIN.

because his family will never be reunited. his daughter (and his sons, peter and harley) wont ever hug him again.

i hope everyone in the ENTIRE GALAXY knows his name, and what he did. i hope they remember him.

tony stark, i love you 3000.

blog.name: alii-bob
blog.title: This Show Will Be The Death Of Me
blog.description: Hey! :) I basically post about anything! I am a part of too many fandoms to actually name.

tags: sorry i have no idea what this is ive just got a lot of feelings about this
summary: Endgame Ending
body:
Endgame Ending

Ok but I honestly don’t think any movie ending has ever hurt me as much as this. Like I understand the circular narrative of Tony finally being at peace and making the ultimate sacrifice to save the world. It was the perfect ending to his character arc and the callback to IM1 with the ‘I am Iron Man’ line was absolutely spectacular. But that being said I’m still absolutely heartbroken that it had to end that way. Iron man has been my favourite super hero since I was 12 years old and seeing him die was like a stab in the heart. I don’t think I’ve cried as much at a movie. Iron man will always be my hero and I’m not entirely sure I’m gonna get over his death, at least not anytime soon.

summary: No era un fin de juego
title: No era un fin de juego
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DAoOta

by hopxfully

Había una única cosa que haría a Steve Rogers rendirse: Bucky.
Pero había una única cosa -una única persona- que le había enseñado que quienes menos corazón parecen tener son los que más amor esconden, y el mayor ejemplo de ello era Tony Stark.

Words: 2155, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Español

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Clint Barton, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Vision (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Pietro Maximoff, T'Challa (Marvel), Okoye (Marvel), Carol Danvers, Nick Fury, Pepper Potts, Peter Parker, Stephen Strange, Wade Wilson
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Stucky, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Wanda Maximoff/Vision, Peter Parker & Wade Wilson, Spideypool
